The deal was closed with Changelly, Kucoin, Luno and we are in negotiations with other Exchanges listed on the website. For example, a demoversion?!  Yes, we have a working version of the App for both IOS and Android. However they are still in the pre-alpha stage so we are not ready to showcase them just yet.   The main sale has started.
